Trigger.name: beacon capture
Trigger.script:
local distance = tonumber(matches[2]) local dir = matches[3] local zone = matches[4] local x = tonumber(matches[5]) local y = tonumber(matches[6]) local desc = matches[7] local color = "#00ffff"
if string.match(desc, "mineable") or string.match(desc, "harvestable") then color = "#ffff99" elseif string.match(desc, "Planet") or string.match(desc, "Satellite") or string.match(desc, "Sun") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid VAI") then color = "#e0e0e0" elseif string.match(desc, "station") or string.match(desc, "voidgate") then color = "#ffb266" elseif string.find(desc, "#%d+") then if not string.match(desc, "structure") then
local ship_id = string.sub(string.match(desc, "#%d+"), 2)
if string.match(desc, "from Song") then color = "#ff33ff" elseif string.match(desc, "from Scat") then color = "#cc6600" elseif string.match(desc, "from Cele") then color = "#0080ff" else table.insert(ship_targets, ship_id) if ship_id == sym.target then desc = ">> "..desc end end
end end
moveCursor('beacon', 0, 0) hinsertText('beacon', color..' '..distance.." "..dir.."\t"..desc.."\n")

if sym.space.boarded then deleteLine() else -- systems checking while not piloting local vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals local sym_ww = (vitals.ww == "1" and true or false) local efficacy = {"wetwiring_efficacy", "mind_efficacy", "muscular_efficacy", "internal_efficacy", "sensory_efficacy"} local systems = {"wetwiring", "mind", "muscular", "internal", "sensory"} if not sym_ww then return end for _, system in pairs(systems) do local value = math.floor(tonumber(vitals[system])) local evalue = tonumber(vitals[efficacy[_]]) if value <= 92.5 and evalue >= 85 then sym.echo('You should mend your '..system..' system') canmend = true break else canmend = false end end
end

Trigger.name: ship weapons tracking
Trigger.script:
sym.space.weapon = sym.space.weapon or {} sym.space.weapon[matches[2]] = {} sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].type = matches[3] --em thermal kinetic gravitic sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].ammo = matches[4] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].charges = matches[5] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].reloadspeed = matches[6] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].ready = matches[8]
function fireShields() for _, v in pairs(sym.space.weapon) do if v.type == "EM" or v.type == "gravitic" or v.type == "kinetic" then send('ship weapon fire ' .. _ .. ' ' .. sym.target) end end end
function fireHull() for _, v in pairs(sym.space.weapon) do if v.type == "thermal" or v.type == "kinetic" or v.type == "gravitic" then send('ship weapon fire ' .. _ .. ' ' .. sym.target) end end end

You are again ready to bind someone.

Hiding in the safety of your cover, you make a few quick and dirty modifications to a spiny shrapnel grenade to increase the radius of the explosion, activate the dangerously short detonation trigger, then huck it out into the open.

You make a few quick and dirty modifications to a handful of explosive putty that you're sure will increase the radius of the resulting explosion. Careless of harm to your own person, you prime the detonation sequence and toss the explosive forward.
